name: Zuma Technology
description:
Zuma Technology specializes in managed services, web design & development and digital marketing. 
Are you a business owner who is fed up with computer and network problems that cause disruption and downtime when you just need to run your business? Are you tired of computer headaches but don't know who you can trust to fix them? Zuma Technology can take the computer support burden off of your shoulders once and for all.
